Description: Minty Mockingbird STC w/ Original case Varitone switch Neck thru build Floyd RoseRecently bought this beauty from a collector, it's pretty much mint with very little sign of even being touched. I think this might be a first year model. Has the REAL rosewood fretboard instead of the faux ebony one of later models. I recently did a setup, action and intonation are perfect, neck is super straight. Holds tune very well, even while dive bombing. Varitone switch is really a nice feature, and makes the guitar useful for studio work. Neck thru construction allows for better tone and sustain. This is a great guitar, that is super lightweight and would be perfect for someone who has back/shoulder problems. Case is included, it did not come with these new, it was an extra option.From GC website:The heart of the STC is its Floyd Rose Original tremolo and a pair of B.C. Rich BDSM humbucking pickups. These high-output pickups are controlled with a selection of knobs and switches that include a 5-position varitone filter knob, two coil tap switches and a reverse phase switch. The neck-through construction also assures great tone and full fingerboard access. Other goodies include an ebony fingerboard, Floyd Rose Special tremolo, diamond inlays and B.C. Rich tuners. The transparent red perfectly highlights this model's quilt maple top. Case sold separately. FeaturesNeck-through constructionB.C. Rich BDSM humbucking pickups5-position varitone filter knob, two coil tap switches and a reverse phase switchEbony fingerboard (this guitar has the rosewood)Floyd Rose Special tremoloDiamond inlaysB.C. Rich tunersCase sold separately
Title: B.C. Rich STC Mockingbird 2008 Red Maple top original case Varitone guitar case
